title: Winter Prayer Times Update
content: Please note that Asr and Maghrib times have been updated for the winter schedule. Updated timetable is displayed in the masjid and on our website.

title: Volunteers Needed for Weekend School
content: We are looking for volunteers to help with our weekend Islamic school. If you can spare a few hours on Sundays, please contact the office.

title: Main Hall Renovation Progress
content: The main hall renovation is progressing well. We thank all donors. Please use the temporary entrance during construction.
